Balthazar:
This is a guild coin! You must have helped a member of the Black Anvil Guild... Well, we Dwarves have long memories for those who render us aid. I will give you one item that prove helpful to you in this task. This is a recipe for converting partial Spiteful Souls into useable energy. If there is a Dwarf in your midst, he will be able to use this on your behalf. Now then, may Maphr bring you a prosperous journey!
